channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 06:17 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 游리 06:17 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 06:15 Dumping anxiety in the Zolotonsky district.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 游릭 06:15 Dumping anxiety in the Zolotonsky district.Creck on subsequent messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:02 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Highorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 05:02 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Highorivska Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
